DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T1.SettlementDays, T5.value SettlementCalendar, T6.value RollConvention, T7.value FlatIndex, T8.value SpreadIndex, T9.value EOM FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsCrossCurrencyBasis T1 LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T5 ON T1.SettlementCalendar = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T6 ON T1.RollConvention = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T7 ON T1.FlatIndex = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T8 ON T1.SpreadIndex = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T9 ON T1.EOM = T9.value

field.name: SettlementCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SettlementCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *RollConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value RollConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *FlatIndex
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value FlatIndex,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *SpreadIndex
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SpreadIndex,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: EOM
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value EOM, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value
